```{r setup}
library(tureen625)
```

Load a dataset

```{r}
data("mtcars")

X_mat <- cbind(1, mtcars$hp, mtcars$am, mtcars$wt)
Y_vec <- as.vector(mtcars$mpg)

ols.fit <- tureen625::fit_OLS(design_X = X_mat, Y = Y_vec)

print(ols.fit$param_estimates)
```
